page.title: 08THE GARAGES IN HANSLOPE
page.content: IN HANSLOPE THERE ARE 2 GARAGES. ONE IS CALLED SPIRE GARAGE AND THE OTHER IS HANSLOPE SERVICE STATION. ONE IS OWNED BY TERRY JONES AND IS IN CASTLETHORPE RD,THE OTHER IS OWNED BY MR G FLETCHER AT 10 HIGH ST.THEY BOTH OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK. ONLY FLETCHER'S SELLS PETROL. THEY BOTH SELL CAR PARTS AND ONE SELLS TOILETRIES.ONE BUILDING IS ABOUT 420 YEARS OLD AND THE OTHER APPROX 150 YEARS OLD.THEY GET THEIR SUPPLIES FROM DIFFERENT PLACES. SPIRE GARAGE GETS THEM FROM BLETCHLEY AND THE SERVICE STATION GETS THEM FROM NORTHAMPTON.THE SPIRE GETS 10-12 PEOPLE IN A DAY AND THE SERVICE STATION GETS OVER 100. AT SPIRE THERE ARE 12 PEOPLE ON THE PREMISES AND ON THE SERVICE STATION THERE ARE 6. THE SPIRE OPENS AT 8-6.30. THE SERVICE STATION OPENS AT 8-7 WEEKDAYS, 8-5.30 SAT, 9.30-12 SUNDAY.
